27658899-c886-4709-99cc-22d7f975ac0d.description: This badge validates an introduction to the basics of Cloud Computing in the BNP Paribas environment. The earner has acquired theoretical knowledge of main concepts and practices associated to the Cloud Computing (Docker containers, Kubernetes, Cloud-native architecture) and discover IBM Public Cloud. The earner has also an understanding of BNP Paribas Cloud strategy, governance and deployment models.
27658899-c886-4709-99cc-22d7f975ac0d.name: BNP Paribas Cloud 101

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas
Follows 100% of the course contents and practical exercises
Passes the end quiz with a score higher than 75%

ace388a4-23d1-40a8-a265-c3f1d5c18b56.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with Architecture in the Cloud through courses and practical cases in order to support a Cloud-hosted application. The earner understands the architecture and infrastructure requirements for deploying microservices-based and cloud-native applications on IBM Cloud and BNP Paribas Dedicated Cloud. The earner has also an understanding of application security and monitoring in the Cloud, as well as new Cloud roles.
ace388a4-23d1-40a8-a265-c3f1d5c18b56.name: Cloud Architecture Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas

77067b8e-94f8-4087-9b49-86970698ddc6.description: The holder of this badge gained an awareness of what is Cloud Computing, its main characteristics and what it means for BNP Paribas.
77067b8e-94f8-4087-9b49-86970698ddc6.name: BNP Paribas Journey To Cloud

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas

d5cc8151-24f4-46fc-a8c7-e50e00fffd3b.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with Operations in the Cloud through courses and practical cases in order to operate a Cloud-hosted application. The earner demonstrates an understanding of the methods & practices related to service management and operations on the Cloud. The earner learns best practices in the areas of Cloud DevOps, build to manage, operational readiness assessment, incident management and problem management.
d5cc8151-24f4-46fc-a8c7-e50e00fffd3b.name: Cloud Operations Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas

7b454d26-0d57-4409-a061-7614fc432c2d.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with Development in the Cloud through courses and practical cases in order to develop a Cloud-hosted application. The earner acquires practical knowledge of Cloud-oriented software development methods (Design Thinking, Domain-driven Design, Agile, DevOps) and also demonstrates the ability to use and implement Cloud-native components (Containers, Kubernetes, etc) to solve valid business challenges within BNP Paribas.
7b454d26-0d57-4409-a061-7614fc432c2d.name: Cloud Development Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas

e9ab0711-dc87-4432-91fe-be09e4003a5b.description: This badge validates a theoretical and practical initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with managing a project related to a Cloud-native application or a product enabled by Cloud-native services. The earner learns the phases in the IBM Cloud Garage methodology and the key practices in each phase (Design Thinking, Agile, Domain-driven Design and DevOps notions). The earner understands the BNP Paribas Cloud policy and governance. The earner also understands new Cloud roles.
e9ab0711-dc87-4432-91fe-be09e4003a5b.name: Managing Projects & Products in the Cloud Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas
Follows 100% of the course contents and practical exercises
Passes the end quiz with a score higher than 75%

4b010202-a094-4879-ac3b-71167d1fb82c.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with security in and on the Cloud and how BNP Paribas chose to apply them to create a secure Cloud environment. The badge covers Cloud security principles and concepts to consider throughout the entire Cloud-native application life cycle, such as: identity & access, threat protection strategy & solutions, information protection & governance, network security as well as logging & monitoring for security.
4b010202-a094-4879-ac3b-71167d1fb82c.name: Cloud Security Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of BNP Paribas

ef299d88-99f4-4321-854f-039945f79997.description: This badge validates an introduction to the basics of API in the BNP Paribas environment. The earner has acquired theoretical knowledge of main concepts and practices associated to the API and discover the API Management solution (Google Apigee). The earner has also an understanding of BNP Paribas API strategy, governance and security.
ef299d88-99f4-4321-854f-039945f79997.name: API 101

b86dcf87-cb4d-4f43-bd05-c3764c05b5fc.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with SRE through courses and practical cases. The learner understands the methodology used by SRE to qualify reliability from a customer centric perspective using the Service Level Objective, manage risk and assess impacts uppon operations done on platform, and how to detect and prior oppotunity to automate manual and sensitive tasks to improve the scoped system reliability.
b86dcf87-cb4d-4f43-bd05-c3764c05b5fc.name: Service Reliability Engineer (SRE) Bronze

4523d43e-2624-4bd1-81e1-625da53eebbc.description: This badge validates the participation to a BNP Paribas Cloud Native Hackathon, where the candidates experimented, built and deployed a real-life application to the IBM Public Cloud
4523d43e-2624-4bd1-81e1-625da53eebbc.name: BNP Paribas Cloud Native Hackathon

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an active and contributing member of a hackathon team during a BNP Paribas Cloud Native Hackathon

Presented a business-oriented solution delivered on the IBM Public Cloud environment. Completed all Hackathon project requirements and presented solution (as a team) to the panel of judges at the project presentation session (including customer impact, expected benefits and BNP Paribas image)
Has been evaluated (as a team) by a panel of judges on the following criteria: Business concerns (Business Impact and User Experience) and Technical concerns (Execution/Technology and Ready to Run)

9b9fba0e-b1d5-4031-9fdd-2ee1f2735bda.description: This badge validates an initiation to the main concepts and practices associated with FinOps through courses and practical cases. The earner understands why FinOps matters for Cloud cost management, has an overview of the pricing models for some services, and learns about the different types of cost optimization. The earner has also an understanding of the Cloud governance components involved in a successfull FinOps adoption.
9b9fba0e-b1d5-4031-9fdd-2ee1f2735bda.name: Cloud FinOps Bronze

46258bda-a459-41df-bdc6-372295177371.description: This badge validates the participation to a BNP Paribas Bootcamp, where participants are trained, challenged and tested over Cloud benefits related to a specific topic. (Applicative Security, Sustainability, etc.)
46258bda-a459-41df-bdc6-372295177371.name: BNP Paribas Bootcamp Participant

52869ef9-e67c-48c3-a90b-6f7dfd87318b.description: Earners of this badge have acquired knowledge on Sustainable IT and Eco-design through theoretical learning and practical exercises. The earners have also demonstrated their commitment to the Sustainability Plan of BNP Paribas.
52869ef9-e67c-48c3-a90b-6f7dfd87318b.name: BNP Paribas ECO Bootcamp

ff327c3c-37fc-4028-83b7-96ec2af8ea65.description: Earners of this badge have an extensive understanding of Cloud Architecture and have acquired a level of autonomy in this discipline. The earner has mastered the main Cloud technologies and practices associated with Architecture in the Cloud to address business problems. The earner has also demonstrated his leadership and his contribution to the BNP Paribas Cloud Community through significant Cloud experiences.
ff327c3c-37fc-4028-83b7-96ec2af8ea65.name: Cloud Architecture Silver

911282e6-8cfc-40e3-b468-e9d31389ab27.description: Earners of this badge have an extensive understanding of Cloud Operations and have acquired a level of autonomy in this discipline. 0e8f2b29-9b07-4a1b-839c-e6cf8d0fbcf9.description: This badge validates an initiation of the concepts and practices associated with the Offering Management. The earner has learned the prescriptive practices needed to define, design, launch & monitor service offerings within the organization as well as the specific application for Cloud Offering, understood the added value of the OM in the IT ecosystem, assert itself in its role of OM to customers & transversal teams and coordinating the different functions to bring offerings into Marketplace.
0e8f2b29-9b07-4a1b-839c-e6cf8d0fbcf9.name: Offering Management (OM) Bronze
